price: ڕاست و ڕەوا تێکەڵ مەکەن بەناڕەواو درۆ حەق و ڕاستی مەشارنەوە، لەکاتێکدا کە خۆتان ئەمە دەزانن
arabic: وَلَا تَلۡبِسُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā talbisū al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumū al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
